```{python}
#| echo: false
#| title: Arabic (ar)
import pandas as pd
import plotly.express as px
df = pd.read_csv('data/ar-recall.csv', index_col=0)
df2 = df.sort_values(by=['Training Size', 'Recall'])
fig = px.bar(df2.astype({'Training Size': str}),
             x='Country', y='Recall',
             barmode='overlay', 
             color='Training Size')
fig.show()
```
